tool_description: Monitors and reports current state of chat queues including length, wait times, and performance metrics.

metric_window.description: Time window for metrics calculation in seconds

error_messages: Invalid queue_types: Must contain only valid queue type names.
Invalid metric_window: Must be a positive integer between 60 and 3600.
usage: Optionally specify queue_types and metric_window. Returns comprehensive queue state information for monitoring and decision making.

total_queued.description: Total number of requests across all queues

average_wait_time.description: Average wait time across all queues in seconds

longest_wait.description: Longest current wait time in seconds
